hero.title: About Us
hero.description: As the authorized agency for Halal Concept hotels, we have meticulously served our guests with booking reservations for over 10 years. We have earned the trust of thousands of families to date. By maintaining the highest level of relationships with hotels, we diligently strive to promptly resolve any issues our guests may encounter in real-time. Every guest is valuable to us, and every hotel we work with is equally important.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Helaltrip Travel was established as a TURSAB member to provide travel alternatives to customers worldwide. The company has prepared and offered hundreds of tours both within Turkey and abroad. Domestically, Helaltrip Travel has agreements with hotels, resorts, numerous airline companies, and provides car rental services. It has quickly distinguished itself in the market with a wide range of travel products, including domestic and international tours, cultural excursions, blue cruises, ski packages, youth-oriented programs, corporate services, flight tickets, and car rental services.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: It is our team's duty to continuously renew and develop itself in the field we work in, planning all details of every task and organization we undertake, and ensuring they achieve their purpose. If you want the service you receive to be flawless, leave everything you have imagined, designed, dreamed of, but couldn't piece together to us.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to closely follow the dynamic and evolving world of tourism, quickly adapting to offer superior service, customer care, and quality to our clients through a highly trained professional team spirit. Our vision is to create value for our customers, meet their expectations with quality and consistency, and become their solution partners.

locamarin.description1: Locamarin Yacht Vacation offers a comfortable, private, and completely personalized vacation experience on the sea. This unique concept in Göcek's exquisite bays brings together freedom and tranquility as an alternative to traditional hotel vacations. Throughout the vacation, only the guests you specify are on the yacht; all details are prepared with comfort, privacy, and privilege in mind.
locamarin.description2: The catamaran and gulet yachts in Locamarin's fleet offer luxurious living on the water with home-like living spaces, air-conditioned cabins with private bathrooms, spacious deck areas, and relaxation corners. In this alcohol-free service concept, many activity opportunities are available including internet, library, board games, SUP, canoe, and sea equipment.
locamarin.description3: Designed for families and friend groups, Locamarin Yacht Vacation is ideal for those who want to experience a vacation intertwined with the sea in a completely private, safe, and calm atmosphere.

yacht1.title: Loca Comfort – Catamaran
yacht1.description1: The 19-meter Loca Comfort catamaran is specially designed for guests seeking a yacht vacation with home comfort. With 3 cabins accommodating up to 8 people, each room features a double bed, air conditioning, shower, and WC. Cabins with floor-to-ceiling windows offer a spacious, sea-integrated living area.
yacht1.description2: With spacious deck areas, a protected sunbathing area, and a mini kitchen on the upper deck, guests can spend comfortable time throughout the day. Alcohol-free service is provided on the yacht, which is served by an all-female crew (captain, chef, and deckhand).

yacht2.title: Loca Istanbul – Gulet
yacht2.description1: The 22-meter Loca Istanbul Gulet, with its spacious living areas and high comfort level, is ideal for large families and friend groups. With 4 cabins accommodating up to 8 people, all rooms feature a double bed, air conditioning, shower, and WC.
yacht2.description2: With spacious deck areas, comfortable relaxation corners, and service accompanied by a professional crew (captain, chef, and deckhand), guests enjoy their vacation in a completely private environment. It offers a safe and peaceful vacation experience with an alcohol-free service concept.

yacht3.title: Loca Venn – Gulet
yacht3.description1: The 17-meter Loca Venn Gulet is designed for guests seeking a more boutique and tranquil yacht vacation. With 2 cabins accommodating 4 people, each room features a double bed and air conditioning.
yacht3.description2: With sunbathing areas, comfortable relaxation corners, and service accompanied by a crew consisting of a captain and chef, Loca Venn is an ideal option for small groups and nuclear families. It offers a peaceful sea vacation with its alcohol-free concept and activity opportunities.
